properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD; Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from North Beach to Drum Point MD; Eastern Bay; Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 3:48AM EST until January 8 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west to northwest winds 20 to 25
kt with gusts around 35 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet expected. For
the Small Craft Advisory, west 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30
kt.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point MD to Smith Point VA,
Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA, Eastern
Bay, Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank
River, Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD, and Tangier Sound
and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM to 6 PM EST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM EST THIS EVENING
